name: Monster Run (410GAMES)
description:
Hi everyone,
We are 410Games, a game studio from South Korea.
Several days ago, we released our second game, 'Monster Run'
Monster Run is a casual running game with monsters on different planets.
How far can you go? Compete with your friends and others around the world!
Available on Google Play>> https://goo.gl/goeq6l

#JUMP #SLIDE #DASH
(psst, more Monsters and Planet maps are coming soon!)
